title: The Ledger of Ghosts
outcome: A hidden audit log surfaces, revealing Halden's systematic erasure of people and critical events from public records. Assemblies and Council race to reconstruct Stenograd’s real history. Bitter disputes emerge over which version of the past to trust as old lies and forgotten sacrifices come to light, fracturing solidarity and changing public memory forever.

events.description: A technician uncovers a long-hidden BCI audit log, exposing systematic erasure of individuals and incidents over two years.
Assemblies organize teams to recover deleted records. Emotional testimonies flood assembly halls as lost histories resurface.
Conflicting discoveries trigger heated debates about whose version of history and which memories should guide the city now.
Divisions intensify as some neighborhoods demand deletion of all BCI data, while others push to preserve restored archives for accountability.
Under mounting pressure, the Council relinquishes authority over city records. An independent assembly drafts a new standard for civic memory and justice.
